titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry Little Jimmy Dickens at Monroe Fairgrounds

mods.abstract: Two color window card (black on yellow) Hatch poster announcing Little Jimmy Dickens at the Jersey County Fair with the Carter Family, Rita Fay and others. Poster features metal photoplates of the Duke of Paducha and Little Jimmy Dickens.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
